titleStmt.title: [Al such psalmes of Dauid as T. Sternehold didde in his life time draw into English metre]
Whole book of psalms. 1533
titleStmt.author: Sternhold, Thomas, d. 1549.
Hopkins, John, d. 1570.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London in Fletestrete ouer against the Cundit, at the signe of the Sunne, by Edwarde Whitchurche,

notesStmt.note: T.p. lacking; title suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Running title: Psalmes of Dauid in metre.
Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: lacks signature C₂ and all before signature C₁.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
